themes: need for stability and continuity in staffing
challenges with bureaucratic processes for artists
impact of paperwork burden on neurodivergent creatives
key_phrases: go slow and give us time to understand
help artists deal with the city's bureaucracy

challenged by the large amount of paperwork
barriers_identified: large amount of paperwork for each grant
